title: Why do i get 2 lol icons?

replies.body: One looks to be for the updated client which is currently in testing, and the other is the legacy client.  It's fine to continue to use the legacy client on the right during testing if you don't want to test!  Hope that helps clear things up!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=1fXbwkEJ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-23T17:07:20.637+0000)
>
> One looks to be for the updated client which is currently in testing, and the other is the legacy client.  It's fine to continue to use the legacy client on the right during testing if you don't want to test!  Hope that helps clear things up!

no no its not that 

when i get into a game i always that icon i usually don't have it there and i ONLY use the new client
